description: This file defines an interface for the ITestUtility component within the WPEFramework, including nested command and iterator interfaces, for testing purposes.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility
classes.description: Interface for a test utility component providing command execution and management features.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand
classes.description: Interface for a command that can be executed within the test utility, supporting description, signature, and naming.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Exchange::ITestUtility::ICommand::IIterator
classes.description: Iterator interface for traversal over commands, supporting reset, validation, and move-next operations.

methods.name: Commands
methods.description: Returns an iterator over available commands.

methods.name: Command
methods.description: Retrieves a specific command by name.

methods.name: ShutdownTimeout
methods.description: Sets or gets the shutdown timeout value.

methods.name: Execute
methods.description: Executes a command with specified parameters.

methods.name: Description
methods.description: Provides a human-readable description of the command.

methods.name: Signature
methods.description: Provides a signature string for the command.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the iterator to its initial position.

methods.name: IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the iterator is at a valid position.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next element.

methods.name: Command
methods.description: Returns the current command pointed to by the iterator.

ctags.name: ICommand
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL ICommand : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IIterator
ctags.pattern: /^            struct EXTERNAL IIterator : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ITestUtility
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ITestUtility : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
